app.layout.title: Davy & Vivian
components.rsvp-email-check.errors.inval: The email should be formatted like username@domain.com.
components.rsvp-email-check.errors.not-i: Your email was not found on the guest list. <u>Let the host know</u>.
components.rsvp-email-check.form.descrip: Get a secret link sent to your email to view your invitation.
components.rsvp-email-sent.heading: Check your email
components.rsvp-email-sent.subheading1: We have sent an email to you at <u>{{email}}</u>.
components.rsvp-email-sent.subheading2: It has a secret link to your invitation.
